m_szDocSumamry: Earth Day in DC: I'll never be dry again April 21st, 2008 by Michelle Bennett   As the GO representative in the Washington D.C. area, I was privileged to cover the weekend Earth Day celebrations on the National Mall. Like any good sojourner, I did my best to plan ahead. I got directions to the Metro station (yay public transit!), I calculated my time, and – naturally – I checked the weather and packed a day bag accordingly.
